entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:15 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -24.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 03:00 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -24.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -32.0°C
Wind: NW 26 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy this evening and ending near midnight then clearing. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 30.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
